name: Caridad Kingsbridge
address: 135 W Kingsbridge Rd, Bronx, NY 10468, USA

reviews.text: Both my partner and I went her twice for dinner. The food is amazing so is the staff and service. My partner Raymond Ladeveze loves the Chuletas with Tostones, and I, Miguelina Torres, the Rice and beans Pork Chops and Liver.

I BEEN A CUSTOMER FOR 10+ years. Itâ€™s crazy how their prices went up, and they give you a small portion. One order now is technically a lunch, $25 for boneless chicken chunks, and the rice and beans come in a lunch container. Cold and not-so-good food. They either changed the owner or something happened with the chefs. TERRIBLE DELIVERY, PORTIONS AND QUALITY. Only good thing is the lady that answers the phone.

Mi primera vez y fue pesimo, compre un lunch y lo que me hecharon fue puro huesos de pollo y la habichuelas ranceas ,las empleadas solo viven haciendo chercha y no te hacen caso ni saludan a los clientes, no lo recomiendo pero para los gusto los colores
Dry, hard to eat mofongo - absolutely tasteless. Even the chicken it came with is hard and without any seasoning. Nasty, & incredibly overpriced
Rica comida

Me comi un pescado y pase  toda la noche vomitando, y luego a los 2 dias compro una sopa de pollo y me pasa lo mismo y la sopa tenia un olor bien extraÃ±o , como puede ser que 2 dias consecutivo me pase lo mismo

The customer service for black people ainâ€™t it. That lady looked at me like I did something to her while I was waiting to be called. I had JUST walked in it was crowded and then she asked me (in the tiny space where you can see everyone walk in) â€œDid you place an order yet?â€ With the nastiest attitude. She made me feel like I shouldnâ€™t be there. I came in with my fair skinned Dominican friend who pointed out that I got treated that way because I was darker. She also mentioned that the worker was nicer to her when she ordered. Itâ€™s 2025. Why are we treating people like this? I came in there to spend money in YOUR establishment, and thatâ€™s how you treat me? As a black woman? I serve YOUR community, and thatâ€™s how you treat me? I donâ€™t even want to food anymore. I would have disputed the charge, but Iâ€™m a woman of God, and I rather WARN other black people instead. Yâ€™all can have the money, I pray you consider how you treat people. Do better.
These guys are great , want real Dominican food done right here it is, best tostones and best â€œchicharron de pollo sin queso(fried chicken chunks) get the dinner well worth it plenty for seconds

Boneless chicken chunks had lots of flavor that the only reason it gets one stars instead of one. The chicken chunks  had so much grease in the tray. The salad ingredients tasted so nasty that I notice they had gone bad yuck. The only thing that tasted decent was the  rice. Never again will I be ordering from here again.

The ladies at the food service is soooo nice and respectful. However when you order over the phone . THIS PARTICULAR PERSON IS  VERY.  DISRESPECTFUL, AND RUDE. HOWEVER LOVE THE OXTAILS AND EICW AND BEANS.
Friendly and caring people. This place is fair when it comes to prices. My wife and I love this place.
The food taste very bad and the price was very high
The strip steak was great.  Tender. Seasoned great.
Great service!!! And delicious food!!!

The food here is always tasty! The only thing I dislike is that this restaurant is super pricey. An avocado salad which is just an avocado cut into slices for $8.00. And I donâ€™t even think it was the whole avocado. Other than that, I think the food is good.
Es otro nivel, es como comer en casa en el patio,todo rico!!!
Realmente me gusta para comer cuando estoy en el Ã¡rea, comida de las que comemos a diario y el ambiente es tranquilo.
Excelente comida
I was there many times but today I have to justify my visit...is gooood

Que orgullo ver la caridad restaurante Todavia abierto especialmente con esta economia tan mala en los Ultimo aÃ±os de verdad que Caridad es El corazon de Kings bridge Road cuantas buenas memorias como niÃ±o en  los fin de los 90s y principios de los 2000s.  What a honor to see Caridad restaurant still open during these tough economic times what a staple in the community they are  the heart of Kingsbridge road so many good memories as a kid in the late 90s early 2000s eating there with family and friends. That place is  extremely popular I remember as a kid seeing Fat Joe and Big Pun eating there all the time and the famous basketball player from the Bronx  Rod Strickland.

Food was really good. The environment needs a little bit more decoration. Service horrible had to give tips because came into the bill and that's why servers nowadays dont give quality in their service because they have put the tips obligatory.
La mejor comida del Bronx para comer pescado fresco el bronzini al vapor lo amÃ©
Filete de pescado, estaba rico
Great place. Great food. Great service
Estuve este domingo si pudiera darle 10 Estrellas se las Daria, la atencion y services fue excellent y muy amables, la comida buena repito las personas k nos atendieron fueron muy buenas
Delicious Food & Drinks with a Beautiful Atmosphere! My partner and I were served well by a kind waitress â¤ï¸

I recently visited this restaurant and was genuinely impressed by its warm and welcoming atmosphere. The interior design is tasteful and cozy, making it a great spot for both casual dinners and special occasions. The lighting is just right, the music sets the mood without being too loud, and the staff is attentive and friendly without being overbearing.

The food? Delicious. Everything was fresh and beautifully plated, and the menu offers a good mix of creative and classic options. I especially appreciated how clean and organized everything felt â€” it really added to the overall experience.

That said, there was one downside that took away from an otherwise perfect visit: the smell of cigar smoke near the entrance. While the restaurant itself is non-smoking (which I love), some patrons were standing right outside the door smoking cigars, and the scent definitely drifted in. Itâ€™s a bit frustrating, especially if youâ€™re sensitive to smoke or just donâ€™t want that lingering smell before a meal.

It wouldnâ€™t stop me from coming back, but I do hope the management can find a way to gently encourage smokers to move a bit further from the entrance. A small change that could make a big difference in an otherwise excellent dining experience.
Esperamos sentados en la mesa y nadie nos atendÃ­a y al final nos tuvimos que ir

I'm not a local, so wasn't sure where to go. So glad we made the choice to stop in! Generous portions and staff was very friendly! Lunch is available starting from sandwiches and salads. We chose a dinner, so our cost was higher.
Verry  good service  they  friendly they have a  the best  service in New York City  and good food
Las personas que cortan los pollos deben cambiarse los guantes, lo vi limpiando y despuÃ©s tocar tu comida como si nada. Ya sabes si te llegas a enfermar ya sabes a donde ir a reclamar.

I had crispy fried plantains and Bronzino (fish)..with Guinness.
It was fresh and delicious.
Service,great  .
As I'm jamaican the food is familiar.
Highly recommend ðŸ‘Œ.
Great mangÃº and pork dishes. Accommodating to customized requests for breakfast and sandwiches. Servers are so friendly. Good vibe.
Too expensive for the neighborhood
Great and attentive staff, food is delicious too!
One of the oldest dominican restaurants in nyc running for close to 40 years, authetic dominican cuisine, a nice environment, with well equipped bar. Good service and good prices.

Horrible service. They take forever and the food did not even taste so good. The seafood tasted as if it was stored for a while and they had to de freeze it. The calamari was very squish and has a werid taste to it and we got the red snapper fish had a weird smell and we could not eat it.

This is a horrible establishment they serve other tables before you. Forget Items. There is a smell as well. If you want to go to a place where they forget about you and not give you things you order this is the place to waste your time. I order with my family and we saw tables that sat before us get served faster and get food faster. We have children with us waiting and no matter how much you tell them something itâ€™s like they forget. Never coming again.
Muy amable, sus personal tienena, muy buenas atenciones, atractivos para ir en familia,
Born and raised on Sedgwick Best food ever I had and also have a wonderful time amazing food ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘
Le mejor comida para mi
Very good breakfast menu

Update: Someone from this location sent a message regarding my review indicating that they only charge gratuity to groups. This is something I'm aware of since the 80s, but a group is 8+ of people. I couldn't respond to the message, so I'll respond here. It was only 4 of us, my son, his girlfriend, a friend, and myself. If this is considered a group, then signs should be put up so customers are aware that even when receiving bad service, they're forced to leave a tip.
=============================
The reason I will not visit again is because they automatically charge you the gratuity, and the waitress did not deserve it. She took our order, brought it to the table, and never came back. Tips are not an obligation to give, and the business should not be allowed to charge it. Tips shouldn't be put on my check automatically. Bad service is not rewarded. Restaurants that do this I do not return too and I never recommend it. Restaurants like this should never be visited or given any business at all.
Es muy bueno!
Great Food n The Ambience.. is unique we had an Appreciation Day Award Breakfast there food was Delicious My first visit was the best. Will definitely go back Again

My go to place for over 30 years! Back in the days, it was a hole in the ðŸ§± wall. Very small and now it's upgraded with a big selection of ðŸ· wines. Everything is delicious and nicely served with fresh garlic ðŸž bread. Area is not the best, but they have free parking lot in back. Just be sure to tip the guys, they are very good watching our vehicles.
I live close by and hardly visit. But when I do visit, the hospitality and service is great. The food is amazing.
The best food in town!!
The best coffee, the best Chivo (goat Meat)
Excellent food, great service. I love all the waitresses so friendly and sweet.

The atmosphere was nice as me and my family and I walked in. The service was ehh okay since they forgot a drink to bring in, and my cousin dont like the service since they bring rice only and have to wait for a couple of minutes to bring the beans to him. And i ordered mofongo de queso. It came out dry and not so good taste. The others ordered steak, and 2 of them came out good, but one of them came out raw undercooked. When cooking it again, it came out raw again, but there was a piece that was cooked, and it was supposed to be well done. Tostones is good. i recommended getting it, and fries are good also.

!! > AND BECAREFUL they automatically added tips in your check. They just put 15 percent tip of our check. We should be able to add our own tip. <<

I used to live a block away from this restaurant . Now I reside in Florida but every time I come back to visit my family in the Bronx I make sure to come back and eat here.  Our waitress is always happy to see us and she actually recognized us and we havenâ€™t been there in almost four years. Food is always amazing , that has not changed , the staff is happy, welcoming and friendly, that hasnâ€™t changed . Highly recommended!

As a Latina, I'm very picky about Dominican restaurants. That being said, the food was delicious! The food was fresh, and was hot when we received it at the table. The chicken was juicy, and nicely baked. The customer service was excellent. The waitress was very charismatic, and was bilingual (English + Spanish).

I have been coming to Caridad for a good 40years..  same location. Same greatness. I love it here. I no longer live in the city however, when I am around I always make a quick stop for chicharronde pollo..  delish.

$10 lunch special is a bit pricey in my opinion, but the food was excellent. The lunch special came with rice, beans, platano, and one meat. I got the pernil and it was moist and  flavorful. Would I return? Yes. But maybe once every couple of months

Update....
You absolutely have to sit outside.
You'll forget your in the busy Bronx.
Food was great as usual.
Very busy and service never disappoints!
Tostones rellenos is a must try.

Great service.
Shrimp Mofongo was great!
Excelente trato, la comida muy buena, ambiente familiar, limpieza 100/100. El mejor tres leches del sector. Delivery y parqueo.
This food is amazing I have been coming over for 30 years the food is always awesome.
This place is amazing... great service, the food is beyond delicious... I highly, highly recommend it... if you are near the Bronx area this is definitely a most visit place.
Great food, friendly service. A local go to spot.

The server was super friendly. Food was delicious, and service was fast.  Music was a little loud, but the place was filled with families having a good time. The place has a nice size parking lot right around the corner. My daughter is a vegetarian and ordered the eggplant Parmigiano. It came with spaghetti, but she was not a big fan of it. My husband and son ordered the deluxe cheeseburger, and they loved it!! I ordered the Cuban sandwich, which was named best Cubano Sandwich in NY, by the NY Post. I ordered the passion fruit juice, but it was not natural. They replaced it for me no problem. It was overall a really nice restaurant.

I love the food quality and the care that the waitstaff has at this Restaurant.

They just added Sushi and it is delicious!!

Wish there was something lower than a star for this review; I just spent $23 dollars on an order of garlic shrimp with green plantains, and I was ripped off. 7 shrimps and what seems to be 2 chopped and friend plantains are not worth $23 dollars Caridad restaurant, not at all.
Great food and service! But all I can say is it's Yuuuummmm!

Very good food and coffee.  Iâ€™m trying to make this place my go to regular food and Iâ€™m trying it out this fall/winter 2022.

So far so good!
Today the outside backyard was closed.  They do not serve as much food as the Malecon on broadway and thatâ€™s all Iâ€™ve noticed so far.
Para comer en el Bronx no hay mejor lugar que karidad restaurant, sencillo, buenos precios muy buena comida, muchas atenciones y un excelente ambiente. Lo recomiendo

Me encanta este lugar es muy acogedor la comida es excelente, es un excelente restaurante para ir en familia, pero  el trato de la chica que nos atendiÃ³ a mi y mi familia fue excepcional de principio a fin. Desde que llegamos, nos recibiÃ³ con amabilidad y una actitud profesional que hizo que nos sintiÃ©ramos bienvenidos. Fue muy atenta , siempre pendiente de nuestras necesidades sin ser invasivo, y nos brindÃ³ recomendaciones del menÃº que resultaron ser excelentes.
AdemÃ¡s, se asegurÃ³ de que todo llegara en el tiempo adecuado y que cada detalle estuviera perfecto. Su trato fue muy cordial, lo que hizo que nuestra experiencia en el restaurante fuera mucho mÃ¡s agradable. Su nombre es Leonela definitivamente un ejemplo de lo que significa un servicio de calidad.
The food was excellent but the desert was not, I bought jello an hour ago and this is what I found when i got home and opened up to Green Mold!

Me parecio muy Salado El plato y con mucho condiments de resto Bien
a lot of salt and a lot of seasoning on my plate, the waitress must have asked, the rest is fine

Went by the review order  white rice and read beans . Very disappointed. Food was horrible cold and the meat look like someone chew on my food and they gave me leftovers . Order a Pepsi can charged me and never got it . The meat was nasty cold and hard like I expected good food with the review it had never order here again wanted something to eat for my bday and couldnâ€™t enjoy dinner .
